title: A Smarter Way to Learn in 4 Guided Steps
body: We don’t just give answers. We break down complex topics into digestible blocks and guide you through the reasoning process.

steps.title: Focused Micro-Learning
steps.body: Topics are split into small blocks to ensure deep understanding without skipping details.

steps.title: Guided AI Assistance
steps.body: Our AI provides leading hints and clarifying questions instead of just giving the answer.

steps.title: Reinforced Practice
steps.body: If you struggle, we explain again and re-test with new problems to ensure true mastery.

steps.title: Human Tutor Connection
steps.body: If the student is still stuck, a human tutor is ready to step in and help clarify.

card_title: Designed for Mastery, Not Just Completion
card_body: By slowing down the 'skip' impulse, we match how the human brain actually learns—through focus, effort, and personalized feedback.
